abstract: Thomas Cook, Europe’s second-biggest travel firm, said on Friday it had raised over $1 billion through new sterling and euro bond issues with the proceeds to be used for general corporate purposes, Reuters reported.
snippet: Thomas Cook, Europe’s second-biggest travel firm, said on Friday it had raised over $1 billion through new sterling and euro bond issues with the proceeds to be used for general corporate purposes, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Cook, Europe’s second-biggest travel firm, said on Friday it had raised over $1 billion through new sterling and euro bond issues with the proceeds to be used for general corporate purposes, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Thomas Cook Raises $1 Billion Through Bond Issues
